Class LineSensorDDRobot

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unibo.DifferentialDriveSimulator.robot.SimpleDDRobot
      • it.unibo.DifferentialDriveSimulator.robot.LineSensorDDRobot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDDRobot, it.unibo.iot.sensors.detector.IDetectorObservable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ColorLineSensorDDRobot

    public class LineSensorDDRobot
extends SimpleDDRobot
implements it.unibo.iot.sensors.detector.IDetectorObservable
    Simulated differential drive robot with two line sensors
    Author:
    Alessio Tonioni

    • Constructor Detail

      • LineSensorDDRobot

        public LineSensorDDRobot(IPoint robotPosition,
                 double heading,
                 double radius,
                 double wheelDistance,
                 double maxSpeed,
                 IMap workingZone,
                 IPoint leftSensor,
                 IPoint rightSensor)
        default constructor
        Parameters:
        robotPosition: - starting center of the wheel axis position
        heading: - robot headings in radiants
        radius: - wheel radius in cm
        wheelDistance: - wheel axis length in cm
        maxSpeed: - max angular speed of the wheel
        workingZone: - map in which the robot moves
        leftSensor: - left line sensor position
        rightSensor: - right line sensor position
